mil.nga.giat.geowave.adapter.vector.transaction

Class ZooKeeperTransactionsAllocater

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.adapter.vector.transaction.ZooKeeperTransactionsAllocater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionsAllocater, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class ZooKeeperTransactionsAllocater
extends Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, TransactionsAllocater
    Use ZooKeeper to maintain the population of Transaction IDs. ZooKeeper's ephemeral nodes are ideal for lock management. and TXID is a node. It is locked if it has a child ephemeral node called 'lock'. If the client dies, the node is deleted, releasing the Transaction ID. The protocol that guarantees one client locks a TX node follows the recipe for locking, where the ephemeral node with the smallest sequence number wins.
